name: com.naukri.physarum
author: Naukri
description:
Physarum is a reactive framework for Unity.

Key features:
▪ Integrates state management, dependency injection, and service locator
▪ Simplifies complex system design
▪ Enhances game development efficiency and flexibility

With Physarum, developers can:
▪ Easily build scalable game architectures
▪ Better manage and maintain large projects
▪ Focus on game logic rather than low-level implementations

Ideal for Unity developers seeking efficient and maintainable game development solutions.
